actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 392.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 100-156.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Post Office located at 315 West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the "Charles E. Chamberlain Federal Building and United States Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the Federal Building and United States Post Office located on West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the Charles E. Chamberlain Federal Building and United States Post Office.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Post Office located at 315 West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the "Charles E. Chamberlain Federal Building and United States Post Office".
